definitions.definition: a set of outer clothes made of the same fabric and designed to be worn together, typically consisting of a jacket and trousers or a jacket and skirt.
examples: outfit, set of clothes, ensemble a pinstriped suit

definitions.definition: a set of clothes to be worn on a particular occasion or for a particular activity.
a complete set of pieces of armor for covering the whole body.
a complete set of sails required for a ship or for a set of spars.
an executive in a business or organization, typically one regarded as exercising influence in an impersonal way.
examples: maybe now the suits in Washington will listen

definitions.definition: any of the sets distinguished by their pictorial symbols into which a deck of playing cards is divided, in conventional decks comprising spades, hearts, diamonds, and clubs.

examples: legal action, lawsuit, (court) case, action, (legal/judicial) proceedings, litigation a medical malpractice suit

definitions.definition: the process of trying to win a woman's affection, typically with a view to marriage.
examples: he could not compete with John's charms in Marian's eyes and his suit came to nothing

definitions.definition: a petition or entreaty made to a person in authority.
examples: entreaty, request, plea, appeal, petition, supplication, application they spurned his suit

definitions.definition: be convenient for or acceptable to.
examples: he lied whenever it suited him
synonyms: meet the requirements of; Moreinformalfit the bill for "savings plans to suit all customers"make appropriate to/for

definitions.definition: act entirely according to one's own wishes (often used to express the speaker's annoyance).
examples: “I'm not going to help you.” “Suit yourself.”

definitions.definition: go well with or enhance the features, figure, or character of (someone).

examples: they took care to suit their answers to the questions put to them

definitions.definition: put on clothes, typically for a particular activity.
examples: I suited up and entered the water
